title: Bug 122105: Schema not added to stored procedure name
description: The schema should be added as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using the stored procedure.
OB: Currently, the stored procedure name is displayed without the schema name.
EB: The stored procedure name should be displayed as 'schemaname.Procedurename' when using the stored procedure.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new report. 2. Create a data source and a data set on the stored procedure. 3. Perform an operation that uses the stored procedure.
